Description:
Move Straight In!
Newly renovated, this rendered BV home is situated in a quiet court and is sure to suit a first home buyer, family or investor, with a potential rental income of $300/week.
Comprising formal lounge with easy care floating floorboards and a reverse cycle airconditioner, opened to the brand new kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher adjoining the dining area, three bedrooms all with built in robes, renovated bathroom with separate bath and shower, new vanity and separate toilet. Newly painted in tasteful, neutral tones throughout.
Outdoors is a large undercover pergola, plenty of enclosed lawn for children to play, carport, and 6 x 9 m steel shed with major bench and electricity. Allotment approximately 697 sqm. Just move in and enjoy all the hard work the present owners have done.

Description:
Big backyard in handy location
On a large block with everything at the fingertips, it's easy to see why this Whittington property makes a great home. The south-facing home sits on a 680sqm(approx.) block and offers a spacious living room with gas heating, well-equipped kitchen and meals area, and three big bedrooms with built-in robes. The softly painted interior is comfortable and cheerful with plenty of natural light, air conditioning and ceiling fans. The keen gardener or outdoor lover will appreciate the huge leafy backyard featuring a paved footpath, decking, workshop, shed and water tank providing the opportunity to easily add a veggie patch or enjoy other hobbies outside. A large
garage and carport ensures adequate car parking and storage space. This property is ideally located only a 5min drive to the CBD and Bellarine and Newcomb shopping centres. Gordon Tafe east campus, Boundary Road shopping strip, schools, sporting facilities and Bellarine Rail Trail are an easy walk away. Make the most of this neat and tidy home today.
Craig Casey : 0459 048 098
Insights: 1 Hickey Street, WHITTINGTON VIC 3219 was last sold in 2012 and 30 other 3 bedroom house in WHITTINGTON have recently been sold.

Description:
A Home to Yourself
Why rent when you can buy into the property market at this extremely affordable level. Situated in a quiet court, close to all amenities, minutes to the Bellarine Shopping Village and 10 mins to Geelong CBD, this home is perfect for a first home buyer or investor, with a potential rental income of $300 per week.
Comprising formal lounge with a gas wall furnace and reverse cycle airconditioner, kitchen/dining with gas stove and sliding doors opening out to the undercover pergola, perfect for combined indoor/outdoor entertaining. There are three bedrooms, two with built in robes, master with walk in robe and access to the 2-way bathroom, providing a separate bath and shower.
The side drive leads to a single remote controlled garage with rear roller door. The pergola has caf blinds, allowing year round use. The neat and private lawn area has a colorbond storage shed, allotment approximately 480 sqm.
There is nothing to do here, just move in and enjoy your new home!

Description:
Heaps of Space, Light and Street AppealThis Ones Got it All!
EPR $200,000 +
The owners of this family home will be sad to leave however, what a great opportunity for you. The current owners have loved this home for the last 18 years and maintained everything.
This home has heaps of street appeal and offers a large back yard with 2 x garages and a carport/alfresco surrounded by garden beds. Situated on a 637m2 block approx.
Inside the home offers 3 bedrooms all with BIR, 2 good sized separate living areas with plenty of light giving the home a great feel. With a handy central bathroom and laundry.
This one is sure to impress with additional features: 900mm SS free standing oven, newly sealed roof, ducted cooling throughout, new blinds and plenty of TV points.
Walking distance to all amenities including shops, schools, transport and Splashdown.
With a projected rental return of $250 per week, this one's going to tick all the boxes.

Description:
Move straight in
Situated in a quiet court, 5 mins to Bellarine Village and 10 mins to Geelong CBD, this home makes the perfect start for a first home buyer or investor, offering a potential rental income of $280/week.
Presented in very neat condition, this property comprises a spacious lounge with a gas wall furnace, kitchen/dining with gas stove and air conditioner. There are three bedrooms each with built in robes. The central bathroom has a separate bath and shower, separate toilet, and access through to the laundry.
Outdoors is a double carport with roller door access, double steel garage and an amazing enclosed entertaining area with built in bar and fridge, ceiling fan and wall mounted TV, an area sure to get lots of use when friends visit. Allotment approximately 557sqm (37 x 15m).
Extras include security monitor, vendor happy to sell fully furnished if required.

Stylish & Spacious Family Living
Nestled on a flat manageable parcel of land, this renovated home offers two spacious living areas, ambient heating with gas & solid fuel freestanding units plus tasteful updates throughout.
Three spacious bedrooms with polished floor boards, ceiling fans and an updated bathroom with spa bath & separate toilet.
Stylish & spacious kitchen with modern appliances including dishwasher flows to a massive rear games room.
Ample off street parking provided with a tandem carport & single lock up garage. Substantial rear pergola, perfect for year round entertaining and secure rear yard suitable for young children or pets.
A most central & convenient location close to parkland, Buckleys Gaming Centre & Newcomb Central Shopping Plaza.

Description:
A Solid & Spacious Home, In A Highly Sought After Location
If you have been looking for a solid brick and well-built home, then this one is defiantly worth a look. Offering two good sized living areas. The Master bedroom has twin robes and access through to the two way bathroom. All bedrooms have BIR. The home has a large 4 car garage, offering 3 off-street parks. The home offers a secure low maintenance landscaped backyard perfect for the kids. All this in a great family area within walking distance to schools, shops, and public transport. Other features include:
Split System
Gas heating
Ceiling fans
Potential for outdoor entertainment area
Access for caravan, boat.
Projected rental return of: $280-$300 pw approx

Description:
MUST BE SOLD! Perfect investment starter
This two bedroom unit in need of a little TLC would make the ideal first investment or one to add to the investment portfolio. Structurally sound and attractive exterior appearance you will be amazed what a little paint and soft furnishings will do to this open plan unit. features include lounge with gas wall furnace and air conditioner, timber laminate kitchen with gas appliances, separate laundry leading out to oversized courtyard, large enough for a small dog and garden beds, separate bathroom with shower and vanity and two double bedrooms with built in robes. Single lock up garage with access into backyard.
Darren Cassar : 0438 939 835
